alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Brown (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 10 at 4:53PM CDT until July 10 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BROWN AND NORTHEASTERN BLAINE COUNTIES... At 453 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Brewster, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...At 445 PM CDT, the public reported half dollar sized hail 9 miles north-northwest of Brewster. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Brown and northeastern Blaine Counties. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
